mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.ToUserName AS "ToUserName", a.FromUserName AS "FromUserName", a.MsgType AS "MsgType", a.Content AS "Content", a.MsgId AS "MsgId", a.CreateTime AS "CreateTime", a.del_flag AS "del_flag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO we_msg( id, ToUserName, FromUserName, MsgType, Content, MsgId, CreateTime, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ToUserName}, #{FromUserName}, #{MsgType}, #{Content}, #{MsgId}, #{CreateTime}, #{delFlag} )
